summary: The document is a memorandum detailing the cancellation of a security clearance for John F. Rittenhouse, identified as a semi-covert employee integrated into an unspecified operation on 13 December 1950. The original clearance was issued on 7 December 1950. The mention of the President John F. Kennedy Assassination Records Act of 1992 suggests the document's historical relevance.
key_findings: Security clearance for John F. Rittenhouse was cancelled.
John F. Rittenhouse was considered a semi-covert employee.
Integration into an operation was noted on 13 December 1950.
The document's reference to the President John F. Kennedy Assassination Records Act of 1992 indicates its potential historical significance.
keywords: President John F. Kennedy Assassination Records Act of 1992
